qas.question: When did the 1973 oil crisis begin?

qas.question: What action did the US begin that started the second oil shock?
What was the price of oil in 1979 before it rose?

What is the term that describes what  happened in 1979 when the US prices of oil were higher?

plausible_answers.text: Arab members of OPEC plus Egypt and Syria

qas.question: What was the oil crisis called
What came after this oil crisis?

context: The 1973 oil crisis began in <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><a0_3><b5_0><b10_0>October<b10_0/><a0_3/> <a0_4>1973<b5_0/><a0_4/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> when the <a4_0><a4_1><a4_3>members of the <a4_2>Organization of Arab Petroleum Exporting Countries<a4_3/><a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> (<a4_4>OAPEC<a4_4/>, consisting of the <b11_0>Arab members of OPEC plus Egypt and Syria<b11_0/>) <b6_0>proclaimed <b14_0>an oil embargo<b14_0/><b6_0/>. By the end of the embargo in March 1974, the price of oil had risen from US<b7_0>$3 per barrel<b7_0/> to <a1_0><b8_0>nearly <a1_1><a1_2><a1_3><a1_4>$12<b8_0/><a1_4/><a1_3/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> globally; US prices were significantly higher. The embargo caused an oil crisis, or "<a3_1><a3_2><a3_4>shock<a3_4/><a3_2/><a3_1/>", with many short- and long-term effects on global politics and the global economy. It was later called the "<a3_0><a3_3><b12_0>first oil shock<b12_0/><a3_3/><a3_0/>", followed by the <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><a2_3><a2_4>1979<a2_4/><a2_3/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> oil crisis, termed <b9_0>the "<b13_0>second oil shock<b13_0/><b9_0/>."
